question: Which flight had the highest number of passengers over 70 years old?
query:
SELECT f.flight_id, COUNT(p.passenger_id) AS num_over_70
FROM postgres_air.boarding_pass b
JOIN postgres_air.booking_leg bl ON b.booking_leg_id = bl.booking_leg_id
JOIN postgres_air.flight f ON bl.flight_id = f.flight_id
JOIN postgres_air.passenger p ON b.passenger_id = p.passenger_id
WHERE p.age > 70
GROUP BY f.flight_id
ORDER BY num_over_70 DESC
LIMIT 1;
